content:
Certainly! Here are some common punctuation marks:

1. Period (.)
2. Comma (,)
3. Question Mark (?)
4. Exclamation Mark (!)
5. Colon (:)
6. Semicolon (;)
7. Apostrophe (')
8. Quotation Marks (" ")
9. Parentheses ( ( ) )
10. Brackets ([ ])
11. Hyphen (-)
12. Dash (—)
13. Ellipsis (...)
14. Slash (/)
15. Ampersand (&)

These punctuation marks are used to clarify the meaning of sentences and to help convey the intended tone and structure in writing.
